CREATE TABLE Test (        
    alter table of Entity
  id                            BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  modificationCounter           INTEGER NOT NULL,
  column_name                   BIGINTNOT NULL,
  column_name_nullable          BIGINT,
  idOtherEntity                 BIGINT NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT PK_Test PRIMARY KEY(id),
  CONSTRAINT FK_Test_idOtherEntity FOREIGN KEY(idOtherEntity) REFERENCES Other(id) NOCHECK,
)
